faq.0-0-body: Welcome to IPTV Tools from ERDesigns. We offer all kinds of software, tools and functions to make your IPTV experience even more fun. Some features require membership and some features are available for free to any user. In this FAQ you will find the answers to frequently asked questions - but if you still have a question that you cannot find an answer to, please create a ticket and we will try to get you started as soon as possible.
faq.0-1-body: You can find the menu at the top of the page. This consists of a number of parts, such as the search field that you can use to search within each page. And on the right side you see the user menu, printing, notifications and full screen. With the user menu you can go to your account / profile settings, your subscription, invoices and tickets. We will go into more detail on each part later in this FAQ, but for now we will continue with the buttons print, notifications and full screen. You can use the print button to print invoices, tickets and other pages, for example. The notifications button provides a menu where all notifications are displayed for you. For example, you will find notifications about your subscription, changes to your playlists or other things that are important to you. The full screen button does exactly what it says, you can use it to quickly switch between full screen and have the most available space on your screen.
faq.0-2-body: You will find the navigation bar on the left. You use these to navigate to the playlists, dashboards, overviews and all other functions available for your subscription. You can hide this with the button you find in the menu on the left, so you can enlarge the workspace even further if you want.
faq.0-3-body: We also try to support the use of mobile devices. Although most functions can be used on a SmartPhone or Tablet for example, we still recommend editing playlists and using the advanced functions on a Laptop or PC. Because a PC or Laptop has a larger screen and a mouse available, you will have the best user experience.
faq.0-4-body: You can contact us in various ways. The easiest way is to create a support ticket. When you create a support ticket you can choose which department your question or comment is directed to, and you can choose a priority. This ensures that we can respond more quickly to urgent questions and that we can find a solution faster. You can of course always send an email, although you should keep in mind that replying to an email will usually take longer than a support ticket.
faq.1-0-body: Your account consists of a username and password. You use this to log in to IPTV Tools and perhaps also within some applications. A profile is linked to your account, we will discuss this in more detail in this FAQ. Your subscription is also linked to your account if you have purchased it. You can cancel your account at any time from your profile. Please note that when you cancel your account, all associated information such as your profile, invoices, subscriptions and support tickets will be deleted.
faq.1-1-body: Your profile contains information such as your name, address, and contact details. You can also find within your profile when you became a member and when your subscription expires. You can also change your password here. You are not obliged to fill in the information on the profile or to provide correct information. This information is only used for correspondence and for invoices. The information on your profile is in no way shared with third parties and is stored in a secure manner.
faq.1-2-body: As indicated, you are not required to provide an email address, or to provide a correct email address. But keep in mind that we use this email address in case you can no longer log in and want to reset your password. If no email address is provided but a phone number is provided, we can recover your account based on verification via your phone number. If neither of these is available, we cannot recover your account, and the costs incurred for subscriptions, among other things, are entirely for the user.
faq.2-0-body: Your membership consists of a prepaid subscription. You therefore pay for a period of your choice. If you switch from a higher account to a lower account, your remaining days will be carried over to your new subscription. If you renew your current subscription, the remaining days will also be added. If you switch from a lower plan to a higher plan, the remaining days will not be included. If you still have a lot of days to spare and still want to take them with you, you can always create a support ticket and we will calculate how many days you can take with you converted to your new subscription.
faq.2-1-body: If you want to cancel your subscription before the end of your subscription, you can create a support ticket. We will then cancel your current subscription for you. Pay attention! We do not make refunds, so if you cancel your subscription prematurely, you are not entitled to a refund.
faq.2-2-body: When you go on holiday or are away from home for a longer period - we can pause your subscription for you. This means that you do not pay for the subscription during the period of your absence and cannot use the functions that come with the subscription. If you return earlier and want to activate your subscription earlier, you can contact us. For more information or to request a break from your subscription, you can create a support ticket for the administration department.
faq.2-3-body: Not sure what to choose? Private is mainly aimed at people who use IPTV in their private situation, at home or at the campsite. Business is primarily intended for individuals who sell or manage IPTV for clients. As a private customer with high requirements you can of course also purchase a business subscription. If you still need more features, larger playlists, or more space - you can always contact us for a customized subscription.
faq.2-4-body: Our prices are not fixed and may change as the number of functions and the complexity of certain functions increase. We try to offer as much functionality as possible for the lowest possible price, but this may mean that our prices are adjusted once or a few times a year. The price for subscriptions applies at the time of purchase, so if you take out a subscription for a year or longer, it is very possible that you will end up cheaper than if you renew per month. As a customer you are always entitled to all new functions within the subscription. The start date of your subscription is therefore independent of this.
faq.2-5-body: If you would like to test one before purchasing a subscription, you can send us a support ticket. Each user is entitled to 7 days of testing a subscription of their choice. After these 7 days you can choose to extend the subscription or to stop it. If you do not renew the tested subscription, you will no longer have access to the functions associated with the subscription. Also, the playlists used in the test will be deleted if the subscription is not renewed.
faq.3-0-body: We are extremely careful with your personal data. Your personal information is not shared with third parties and is stored securely in a secure environment. Your data will only be used for contact and to recover your account in the event of loss of your password.
faq.3-1-body: In the event that a third party would request data from our users, all personal data will be destroyed. We do this to guarantee our users 100% security. We do not offer (illegal) content ourselves, but will do everything to secure the data of our customers. We take no responsibility for the content available through our users' playlists. As a user, you must ensure that the content available in the playlist is legal in the country where you live.
faq.3-2-body: We have no accountability whatsoever to the BREIN foundation. We do not offer any content ourselves - and only offer options to adjust playlists and request content. If you live in a country where the BREIN foundation has authority, you are responsible for the content available in the playlists, and we (IPTV-Tools) cannot be held responsible in any way. We do not control playlist sources, and we are not affiliated with IPTV providers.
faq.3-3-body: Using, viewing or sharing illegal content is illegal and punishable by law. We do not do any checks on content or sources in the playlists. The rules regarding IPTV differ per country, and you should be aware of these rules yourself.
faq.4-0-body: We currently offer payment options via Paypal and Paysafe. Via paypal you can pay with your paypal account, and as a guest with your credit card. Payment via paysafe is also possible, but only manually, you need to create a support ticket for this. We may offer other payment methods in the future, but no guarantees are made on this.
faq.4-1-body: We do not offer refunds. Our payment model works on a prepaid basis, where you pay in advance for a specific period. If you choose to cancel early, you are not entitled to a refund. In certain cases we offer a refund, for example with a double payment. You can always create a support ticket for this and we will see if we can do something for you. Please note that for refunds, the handling fee and payment fees (Paypal / Paysafe / Other) will be deducted from the refund amount.

hero.title-1: All the tools you need at your fingertips!
hero.subtitle-1: Daily Sync, EPG, Station Logos, Xtream API, M3U...
hero.title-2: So much more than just a playlist editor!
hero.subtitle-2: Import videos, assign epg, sort, assign TV station logos, anything you need!
hero.title-3: Manage, watch and download your favorite movies and series!
hero.subtitle-3: And choose the language of all movie and series information.
hero.gradation-subtitle-1: Don't miss a single update and always watch the latest channels, movies and series!
hero.gradation-subtitle-2: You have the best TV experience with EPG, and if your provider offers catch-up you can also watch your favorite programs later!
hero.gradation-subtitle-3: We offer a full Xtream API, which allows you to use IPTV Smarters with your personalized playlist, among other things!
hero.accordion-title: Get the most out of your IPTV Subscription!
hero.accordion-text-1: Hide or remove groups -, channels, movies and series you don't need. Do you prefer TV channels in a different order? Or are you missing station logos? Or would you like to add radio stations? No problem! In the editor you can adjust your playlist completely to your wishes!
hero.accordion-text-2: Do you use a player that works with Xtream-API? Or do you prefer an M3U? You choose what kind of playlist you want to use! With our Xtream-API you can now also personalize your playlist and use IPTV Smarters app, complete with EPG, movie and series information in the language you choose, and watch programs back with catch-up (ask your provider).
hero.accordion-text-3: Doesn't your provider have an EPG? No problem at all! We offer epg for different countries. You can easily assign it in the editor, and if you use the Xtream API you will automatically see the EPG in your favorite player. If you use a M3U then you can use the EPG as XMLTV file.
hero.accordion-text-4: You get a nice overview of all movies and series that your provider offers. You can see which movies are in theaters now, popular movies and series, and you can easily search for your favorite movie or series with the search function. We retrieve movie and series information from TMDB in the language you choose!
hero.features-subtitle: We offer a wide range of features to personalize your playlist
hero.pricing-subtitle: You already have a subscription from â¬ 2.50 per month. If you need more functions, the Pro package is for you!

screenshots.text-1: We do not only offer an M3U but also an Xtream-API! So you can get the best out of your IPTV experience, without sacrificing features.
screenshots.text-2: Sync your playlist daily, and don't miss a single update! Your personalized playlist will be preserved and we will add new channels, movies and series automatically!
screenshots.text-3: Secure your playlist and prevent others from abusing your IPTV subscription. You can set multiple IP-Addresses so you can watch IPTV on your favorite locations.
screenshots.text-4: With our editor you can easily and quickly put channels, movies, series and groups in the order you want.
screenshots.text-5: Customize groups to your liking, with our tools you can quickly and easily rearrange, rename, delete or hide groups.
screenshots.text-6: Customize streams to your liking, you can quickly and easily add, delete, edit, reorder and more!
screenshots.text-7: Wondering what movies are offered by your IPTV Provider? You can easily and quickly choose and watch movies.
screenshots.text-8: See immediately which movies are in theaters now and are offered by your provider. Never miss the latest and greatest movies again, guaranteed a great TV evening!
screenshots.text-9: Would you like to find out quickly if the film you are looking for is available? With our search function you can quickly find the film you want!
screenshots.text-10: Wondering which series are offered by your IPTV Provider? Then browse easily by genre between all series. You will immediately see the rating, number of available seasons and episodes.
screenshots.text-11: Are you waiting for your favorite series? Or did you miss the new episode on TV? At Now on TV you can see immediately which series are now on TV and available for you.
screenshots.text-12: Want to quickly see if the series you are looking for is available? With our search function you can quickly find the series you want!
screenshots.text-13: All your payments and statements in one place, you can easily and quickly find and print your payment.
screenshots.text-14: With our ticket system it's even easier to ask questions, and you have all your support tickets in one place.
screenshots.text-15: You can easily choose the department for your question/comment, and you can directly view the call history when answering.
screenshots.text-16: Our downloader is now integrated, which means that you can download movies and series more easily. You can use multiple instances, so you can download to the laptop/pc/raspberry/server of your choice!
screenshots.text-17: You have direct overview of all your downloads, so you can download to different devices and you can manage everything in one place!
screenshots.text-18: Import your favorite radio stations fast and easy, you can search and add them directly into the editor!
screenshots.text-19: Import your favorite videos from Youtube, Vimeo, Dailymotion, Ted-Talks and XHamster quickly and easily! These videos are streamed through our server so they are guaranteed to work on any player!
screenshots.text-20: Doesn't your provider offer an EPG? No problem at all! With the editor you can quickly assign EPG to your channels, do you use a M3U and SmartIPTV? Then you can also assign SmartIPTV epg-codes from within the editor! It doesn't get any easier than this.
screenshots.text-21: With our editor you can keep using your favorite apps with a personalized playlist! Choose whether you want to use Xtream API or M3U! Choose your language for movie and series information, and watch like never before!
